content.rendered:
Check out our wonderful

Newspaper Gallery

We're always delighted to discover our themes behind beautiful websites. This is our way of thanking our customers!

Buy Newspaper

Discover websites

Fractal Enlightenment
"Newspaper is by far the best theme I have used, with its continuous development efforts to keep up with the fast changing pace of web technology. If you are someone who manages everything on the WordPress backend, frontend, site speed etc, Newspaper makes life easier and web performance fun"
Fractal Enlightenment is a lovely website that publishes great content on spirituality, self-development, parenting, meditation, yoga, and more. It has a great perspective and it's simple and elegant design match an extraordinary vision.
iDecor360
"It was a nice experience. The theme is easy to use and customize."
Architecture, interior design, space, color psychology are just a few of the proposed topics of this stylish Arabic website.
Manchester United
"Absolutely brilliant theme, easy to use and reliable."
Manchester United Canada is a multilingual sport website. With news from the football world, players, Premier League, Champions League, and more, this is an up-to-date platform.
Top Magazin Frankfurt
"A well customizable and lightweight theme. High compatibility with other plugins. Our image-heavy magazine-website has never been faster."
With a great success, this German online magazine is publishing top notch stories from business, lifestyle, arts and more.
Sa Calatorim
"An incredibly easy experience: everything fluid, functional, practical!"
Sa Calatorim is a lovely Romanian website that publishes unique experiences about worldwide travels. You can find comprehensive how-to guides, best eat and sleep tips, and reasons to choose your destination.
Seashore
"So many possibilities, that it could be overwhelming. But then there's the great support staff to answer all your questions. Plus, there's a huge selection of templates available, that you can tailor to your own needs. Hands down the most versatile WordPress template we know. When we try to meet specific needs on client websites we created before we knew tagDiv, we now say "we could do that in Newspaper"."
Seashore is a beautiful presentation website for a web consulting agency. It can assist companies with social media accounts, communication plans, translations, and provides web hosting services.
Curierul National
"Very nice theme and simple to use."
Curierul National is a Romanian local newspaper. With a clean layout and text with image boxes, the news from Romania and Europe delight the every day readers.
Money Buzz Europa
"This is a very good theme."
Money Buzz is a neat online magazine about finance and business news. Moreover, this website publishes real estate, technology, and travel insights.
Descopera
"Great theme, exactly what I needed!"
Descopera is a Romanian ONG blog, designed to support education through scientific, cultural researches. From movie reviews to science, astronomy, tech, and environment articles, this is a valuable and engaging website.
Doctor Spin
"The best WordPress theme I’ve ever worked with."
The Doctor Spin is a personal business page located in Stockholm. The website is related to everything about public relations, blogging, digital strategy, as well as communication psychology.
Caleidoscope
"I have been using Newspaper theme for two of my websites for 7 years now and I just love it. Caleidoscope looks great because of this theme and the best part is the freedom to customize your theme like you dreamed."
Indian art, culture, and popular places are a few of the Caleidoscope approaches. With vivid imagery and insightful stories, this lifestyle blog brings joy and educational tips at the table.
Live in the Beat
"It's been great! The theme is so easy to use and style; there isn't actually anything that I haven't been able to do with regards to the look and feel of my blog. The forums are really helpful and there is usually an answer online or someone willing to help out."
Live in the Beat is a personal motivational & lifestyle inspiring website. It is crafted with passion and great attention to details and high quality images.
Calculatorescu
"I like the way I can customize the theme with the templates imported from cloud. Overall it`s a good WordPress theme that I see has nice updates to keep everything running smooth."
Calculatorescu is a comprehensive Romanian tech portal. It covers IT news, phone & computer reviews, WordPress tips, and gadget articles.
Emakayah
"Easy. Fast. Intuitive."
Emakayah is an amazing Malaysian parenting website. From parenthood resources to school advices and healthcare solutions, this website is a great educational platform.
Descubrir
"It's great. I've used in many projects and I find it very complete."
Descubrir is a beautiful Spanish travel blog. It publishes interesting posts on worldwide destinations, full travelling experiences, and news about all kinds of transportation companies.
Verbraucher Online
"Newspaper is a very versatile theme, excellent for any type of news driven projects. We use it for a consumer website and our visitors appreciate the excellent, clear look of the theme."
Verbraucher Online is a German website that is dedicated to test products and publish in-depth reviews about hardware store, household, or leisure items.
Juarez a Diario
"Newspaper X is very intuitive and straightforward. We fully build it by one man in one night. Of course we knew exactly what we want to achieve ahead of the process."
Juarez a Diario is a local newspaper of the Mexican Juarez city. It mainly focuses on subjects of interest for the local citizens.
Messinian Story
"Newspaper by tagDiv is a well-constructed theme following web design standards and best practices and provides all the necessary tools to create and maintain a website with high-standards."
Messinian Story is a great-looking Greek presentation website that reflects everything about olive oils and their branding philosophy.
Lux Travellers
"One of the best themes ever! Love how quick and simple it is to import a demo and then customize it to your preference."
If you're looking for the perfect holiday, Lux Travellers is a complete travelling site. From online booking to destination guides, hotel reviews, and anything in between, this website is a full resource.
Trail and Kale
"I really enjoy the versatility/configurability of the Newspaper Theme. I've used it on another one of my businesses too. Customizing the theme to my needs is a joy."
Trail and Kale is a personal blog meant to be a source of inspiration for people that enjoy the lovely nature. It's all about hiking, trail running, outdoor adventures, and healthy leaving.
123...6Page 1 of 6

Over 120,000+ Customers Are Already Building Awesome Websites

Join our enthusiastic community to get powerful tools to build your dream, and free lifetime updates. Did we mentioned that we have an awesome customer support?

Buy Now
